snippet: A leader of student protests at Columbia University in 1968, Justice Reichbach went on to be a well respected, if sometimes controversial, judge of the New York State Supreme Court.
abstract: Gustin L Reichbach, judge of the New York State Supreme Court known for fierce independence, dies at age 65.
lead_paragraph: A leader of student protests at Columbia University in 1968, Justice Reichbach went on to be a well respected, if sometimes controversial, judge of the New York State Supreme Court.

headline.seo: Gustin Reichbach, Judge With a Radical History, Dies at 65
headline.main: Gustin Reichbach, Judge With a Radical History, Dies at 65
headline.print_headline: Gustin Reichbach, 65, Judge Known for Fierce Independence
